definition: to fight and scheme against each other (idiom)/(in palace construction) elaborate and refined
see 勾當|勾当[gou4 dang4]
surname Gou
to attract/to arouse/to tick/to strike out/to delineate/to collude/variant of 鉤|钩[gou1], hook
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
surname Jue

sentences.english: Proud nobles quarelled or plotted against each other.
sentences.chinese: 傲慢的貴族彼此勾心鬥角。

sentences.english: There are many people who intrigue against each other for power and position.
sentences.chinese: 很多人因爲奪權謀位而勾心鬥角。

sentences.english: Jabba tasked his two competing henchmen to capture the elusive stowaway.
sentences.chinese: 賈巴命令兩個勾心鬥角的心腹去捉拿逃跑的偷渡者。

sentences.english: Only after twenty years' jockeying for power did he attain this position of great influence.
sentences.chinese: 勾心鬥角二十年，他才爬上了這把極有權勢的金交椅。

sentences.english: Intrigue against each other is quotidian in every company.
sentences.chinese: 勾心鬥角在每個單位都司空見慣。

definition: contemporary drama
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
petty/small-minded
to quarrel/to bicker/glib repartee
passionate love (idiom)
to murmur endearments (idiom)/to get into a romantic relationship
to covet/envious/jealous/green with envy/infuriated/furious
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
scheming/shrewdness
unpleasant to the eye/objectionable
to lose one's standing/to have one's reputation swept away/a complete defeat and fall from grace
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
to have a grudge against
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
